title: IoT
content: Get familiar with IoT Boards, like Arduino, Raspberry Pi, etc.

title: Virtualization
content: Learn about some basic virtualization technologies, like VirtualBox, Docker, etc.

title: Networking
content: Now you learn how to build your own simple network, and know how to use some basic network tools.

title: Backup
content: Learn how to backup your data, and how to recover it.

title: Security
content: Learn how to secure your network, and how to protect your data.

title: Tools
content: Learn how to use some basic tools, like Ansible, etc.

title: Applications
content: After you have your own network, you can now deploy some applications, like databases, nextcloud, etc.
